name: WangGuard Blacklisted Words Add-On
author: WangGuard

sections.description:
WangGuard Blacklisted Words is an Add-on for WangGuard plugin. You can blacklist words and they may not be used in Usernames, emails, Names, Site titles, Site urls, Post content, etc. If a blacklisted word is used in a post, this WangGuard add-on will email you the URL.

It is compatible with WordPress, WordPress Multisite, BuddyPress and WooCommerce.
WangGuard plugin version 1.6+ is needed
sections.installation:
1. Download and install WangGuard Registration Nocice Add-on

  2. Activate plugins through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress (if is a Multisite, WangGuard needs to be activated for the Network)

  3. Updates are automatic. Click on “Upgrade Automatically” if prompted from the admin menu. If you ever have to manually upgrade, simply deactivate, uninstall, and repeat the installation steps with the new version.
sections.faq:
How to use it?

It’s easy, go to WangGuard -> WangGuard settings and add you Blacklisted Words.

short_description: WangGuard Blacklisted Words is an Add-on for WangGuard plugin. You can blacklist words.
